text: @mattgaetz In Biden's America, white supremacists wouldn't be cheered by the Pres. In Biden's America, American soldiers wouldn't be murdered for a Kremlin bounty without a single fcking consequence. In Biden's America, there wouldn't be 2.59M confirmed cases and 130k deaths to covid19.
